General.Name: Nusantara Pelabuhan Handal Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Nusantara Pelabuhan Handal Tbk manages and operates container terminals in Indonesia and internationally. It operates through Port Services, Port Equipment Sales, and Others segments. The company provides stevedoring handling and container services; goods loading and unloading services; and repair and maintenance services. It is also involved in the trading terminal activities. In addition, the company offers equipment services; and engineering services, retrofitting, and lashing structure systems for shipment. Further, it supplies cranes; and provides transportation services. The company was formerly known as PT Kharisma Mutiara Agung and changed its name to PT Nusantara Pelabuhan Handal Tbk in November 2016. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Nusantara Pelabuhan Handal Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Episenta Utama Investasi.
